name: pmdb-api
description: This is an open source movie database that can be used to retrieve data about various movies. It is a demo Node.js,Express and MongoDB REST API, built with the purpose of:   - demonstrating how to build a REST API using the above techonologies  - demonstrating programming best practices and organizing code in a very maintainable manner  - serving as a mock backend for anyone who is venturing out to learn a new frontend framework
